name: Kulu the Pangolin
description: Kulu the Pangolin is a crypto project on the networkis a crypto project on the Solana network that features the character of Kulu, a cartoon pangolin inspired by a real-life threat to pangolinsâ€”the world's most illegally trafficked mammal. Through Kulu's story, this project aims to raise awareness about the threat of pangolin extinction, by combining digital assets and wildlife conservation efforts in a creative and impactful way.
